name: variable_id
comment: Variable ID. ID of variable. Ex: 13 (type: integer)

name: timestamp
comment:
Timestamp. Time that this measurement occurred

Uses epoch minute (epoch time divided by 60). Timestamp for the measurement event in epoch time (unixtime) (type: integer)

name: earliest_measurement_time
comment: Earliest measurement time. Excluded records with measurement times earlier than this value. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss  datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)

name: latest_measurement_time
comment: Latest measurement time. Excluded records with measurement times later than this value. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss  datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)

name: created_at
comment: Time at which the Variable User Source was Created At. When the record was first created. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: updated_at
comment: Time at which the Variable User Source was Updated At. When the record was last updated. Use UTC ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss datetime format. Time zone should be UTC and not local. (type: string)  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: deleted_at
comment: Time at which the Variable User Source was Deleted At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: number_of_raw_measurements
comment: Number of Raw Measurements. Filter variables by the total number of measurements that they have. This could be used of you want to filter or sort by popularity. (type: string)

name: client_id
comment: Client ID. Your client id can be obtained by creating an app at https://builder.quantimo.do (type: string)

name: earliest_measurement_start_at
comment: Time at which the Variable User Source was Earliest Measurement Start At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.

name: latest_measurement_start_at
comment: Time at which the Variable User Source was Latest Measurement Start At.  in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS in the UTC timezone.
